nodes.text: Mandalorian rally master armor was ancient Mandalorian armor that dated back to the Old Republic-era, worn by the rally masters who served as battlefield commanders during the Mandalorian wars of expansion. A near complete set of the armor was housed at the Museum of Mythos on Kalevala, where it vanished, stolen. An identical set—suspected to be the same by the Imperial Security Bureau—later surfaced in Crimson Dawn crime lord Dryden Vos' collection aboard his yacht, the First Light.
